com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.listeners

Class ServerActionsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.listeners.ServerActionsListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class ServerActionsListener
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerActionsListener() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFoodLevelChange(org.bukkit.event.entity.FoodLevelChangeEvent e)
      Used to prevent the food level to drop if the player is a spectator.
      void onGamemodeChange(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerGameModeChangeEvent e)
      Used to prevent spectators from changing their gamemode whilst spectating.
      void onPlayerDeath(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerDeathEvent ev)
      Saves the death message & location, if the "teleportation to the death point"s tool is enabled.
      void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent ev)
      - Hides player with the permission when they join; - hides the spectating players from the joining player; - re-enables the spectator mode if it was enabled before.
      void onPlayerQuit(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent ev)
      If the player was spectating: - the spectator mode is disabled, so the in-game inventory is saved; - the fact that this player was spectating is stored into a file, to re-enable the spectator mode on his next join.
      void onPlayerRespawn(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerRespawnEvent ev)
      Used to enable the spectator mode for dead players, if this option is enabled in the config.
      void onWorldChange(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerChangedWorldEvent ev)
      Handles MultiverseInventories & other similar plugins.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerJoin

        public void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent ev)
        - Hides player with the permission when they join; - hides the spectating players from the joining player; - re-enables the spectator mode if it was enabled before.

      • onPlayerQuit

        public void onPlayerQuit(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent ev)
        If the player was spectating: - the spectator mode is disabled, so the in-game inventory is saved; - the fact that this player was spectating is stored into a file, to re-enable the spectator mode on his next join.

      • onPlayerDeath

        public void onPlayerDeath(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerDeathEvent ev)
        Saves the death message & location, if the "teleportation to the death point"s tool is enabled.

      • onPlayerRespawn

        public void onPlayerRespawn(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerRespawnEvent ev)
        Used to enable the spectator mode for dead players, if this option is enabled in the config.

      • onWorldChange

        public void onWorldChange(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerChangedWorldEvent ev)
        Handles MultiverseInventories & other similar plugins.

        Disables spectate mode to restore proper inventory before world change; then re-enables spectate mode to restore spectator inventory after world change.

      • onGamemodeChange

        public void onGamemodeChange(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerGameModeChangeEvent e)
        Used to prevent spectators from changing their gamemode whilst spectating.

      • onFoodLevelChange

        public void onFoodLevelChange(org.bukkit.event.entity.FoodLevelChangeEvent e)
        Used to prevent the food level to drop if the player is a spectator.
